!Warrior's Grave: The Sirens possess more than simply physical powers; they also possess psychic abilities. In the past, they could impose their wills on others, forcing them to do their bidding. Without Shilen and her mighty Elrokian warriors, this island is doomed...unless you can prevent it. Hear my words! [Quest _126_IntheNameofEvilPart2 warriorgrave_q126_16.htm|Listen.]
